GeDBIT.app

类 QueryVPIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.app.QueryVPIndex

  • public class QueryVPIndex
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class to query a VPIndex. It, taking command line parameters, runs a set of query on the given index and compute the average performance. main function to evaluate the query performance of an Index The eveluation is done by run a set of query on the Index, and compute the average performance statistics, such as number of distance calculation, number of index node visited (#I/O), and search time. The command line interface to bulkload one Index, or a series of Indexes for scalability study. -d [name of index, should be a prefix of the actual file name containing serialized database] -q [query file name] -f [offset of first query to be used in the query file, start from 0, inclusive, default 0] -l [offset of last query to be used in the query file, exclusive, default 1] -i [minimum search radius, default 0] -a [maximum search radius, default 10] -s [step size for search radii, default 1] -t [data type, "vector", "protein", "dna", "image", "mass", "string"] -p [length of the path distance list] -v [1 if search results are to be verified against a linear scan and 0 otherwise, default 0] -g [debug level, default 0] -frag [fragment length, only meaningful for Sequences] -dim [dimension of vector data to load, only meaningful for DoubleVectors] -res [output results to the given filename] The Metric is hardcoded for each give data type.
    版本:
    2006.06.27
    作者:
    Rui Mao, Willard

    • 构造器详细资料

      • QueryVPIndex

        public QueryVPIndex(Index index,
            Table query,
            double minRadius,
            double maxRadius,
            double step,
            boolean verify,
            java.util.logging.Level debug,
            int pathLength,
            int frag,
            java.lang.String resultsFileName,
            int firstQuery,
            int lastQuery,
            java.lang.String forPrint)
        参数:
        index - the Index to be evaluated
        query - the Table to query the index with.
        minRadius - the minimum range query radius to run
        maxRadius - the maximum range query radius to run
        step - the increament unit of the range query radius
        verify - if true, search results of each query will be verified by a linear scan
        debug - decide how much execution log will be output, 0 means nothing.
        pathLength -
        frag -
        resultsFileName - the name of the file to save the results to.

    • 方法详细资料

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        参数:
        args -

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate()
        the primary method to do the evaluation. It first run the queries for each query, during which the statistics are set, then output.

      • evaluateRadius

        public void evaluateRadius(double radius)
        evaluate the index with one fixed range query radius and all the queries. each query is run with the given radius, search statistics are collect, and compute average and min, max values. the average, min and max values are store in the corresponding data fields
        参数:
        radius - the search radius

      • verifyResult

        public boolean verifyResult(java.util.List<IndexObject> resultList,
                   RangeQuery q)
        verify the search results of a query by a linear scan
        参数:
        resultList - the results of query
        predicate - the query
